channel.title: ~NEED A HOSTER~ And ~WEBCLIENT~ Giving Co-Owner
channel.description: Hi, I need a hoster and webclient for my 639 rsps. My no-ip doesnt work and my webclient does a weird network error. Ill give them co-owner on my server if they can help. -------------------------------------------------------------------- Email:rscheapgamer@hotmail.com Skype:Emptyone99 Server website for webclient: http://westpk.vacau.com/ -------------------------------------------------------------------- Thanks, Emptyone99` -------------------------------------------------------------------- P.S Any Host is ok ;D.

item.title: ~NEED A HOSTER~ And ~WEBCLIENT~ Giving Co-Owner
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Requests are not allowed. If you’re looking for a hoster, PM members of the forum and advertise the availability in your signature. Then the responsibility of posting and getting yourself (and your signature) known falls to you.

Read full topic

item.title: ~NEED A HOSTER~ And ~WEBCLIENT~ Giving Co-Owner
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

  1. Offering a reward for someones help is not allowed, help is free on this community.

Please read all the rules before you post. And surely you won’t find a free hoster. Try to learn a little about coding, making your own webclient, If you need help try this site called “google.com”. Then when people are interested in your server they’ll consider donating, or you can ask your parents. Then you can use the money to buy a vps from a LEGITIMATE site. Then a hoster will not be needed.

Read full topic

Webclients are client sided, try there.
